# scalesLargeContentImage

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the view scales the item’s image to a larger size or not.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var scalesLargeContentImage: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the viewer displays the image at its intrinsic size.



## Configuring display properties

- **largeContentTitle**: A string that describes an item to display in the large content viewer.
- **largeContentImage**: An image that represents an item to display in the large content viewer.
- **largeContentImageInsets**: Insets to adjust the position of the item’s image so it appears visually centered in the large content viewer.
